data.actual_result: It clears itself on reload or filtering
data.expected_result: the @ everyone mention should stay in your recent mentions until you clear it
data.short_description: In recent mentions @ everyone clears itself if the server has @ everyone and @ here suppressed
data.steps_to_repro: - Open discord to any server - mute a server, and suppress @ here and @ everyone mentions - open your recent mentions - have someone @ everyone in the server you suppressed the notifications - note the mention is there - now filter the mentions, or reload your client - clear the filter or re-open the recent mentions
